message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this exceptional product. Given its unique value, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,500,000. I believe this reflects its worth, but I'm open to discussing further.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you see in the product, but given my budget constraints, I am unable to meet the proposed price of $1,500,000. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,000,000. I hope this aligns better with what you're able to offer.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer. While I understand your position, the value of this product is substantial. I'm willing to negotiate, but I can't accept $1,000,000. How about we meet in the middle at $1,350,000?

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. After careful consideration, I am still looking to keep my spending within a certain budget. I would like to counter with an offer of $1,250,000. This price better aligns with my financial situation while still recognizing the value of the product.
